duties_responsibilities.duty: Safely operate a tractor-trailer combination, including doubles and triples, and provide excellent service to customers.
Generate sales leads and load/unload freight.
Pass a DOT drug test, work a flexible schedule, and maintain safe driving and operational practices.
Ability to lift heavy objects, climb in/out of a tractor cab/trailer, operate heavy equipment and forklift, and transport hazardous/non-hazardous materials.

education_certification.credential: Valid Class A commercial driver's license and hazardous materials, tank vehicle, and doubles/triples endorsements within 90 days of employment.
